trans-unit.source: Creating a Driver From Existing Source Files
trans-unit.target: Creating a Driver From Existing Source Files

trans-unit.source: The WDK is integrated with Microsoft Visual Studio, and uses the same compiler and build tools that you use to build Visual Studio solutions and projects.
trans-unit.target: The WDK is integrated with Microsoft Visual Studio, and uses the same compiler and build tools that you use to build Visual Studio solutions and projects.

trans-unit.source: [MSBuild](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=262804) replaces the Windows Build Utility (Build.exe) that was used in versions of the WDK prior to Windows Driver Kit (WDK) 8.
trans-unit.target: [MSBuild](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=262804) replaces the Windows Build Utility (Build.exe) that was used in versions of the WDK prior to Windows Driver Kit (WDK) 8.

trans-unit.source: To convert a driver that was created with a previous version of the WDK, create a new Windows driver solution in Visual Studio using one of the provided Windows driver templates.
trans-unit.target: To convert a driver that was created with a previous version of the WDK, create a new Windows driver solution in Visual Studio using one of the provided Windows driver templates.

trans-unit.source: If you start with a template for your driver model, the structure of the project will be in place and the correct platform tool set will be selected.
trans-unit.target: If you start with a template for your driver model, the structure of the project will be in place and the correct platform tool set will be selected.

trans-unit.source: You can then add your source files to the solution.
trans-unit.target: You can then add your source files to the solution.

trans-unit.source: For information about selecting templates, see [Creating a New Device Function Driver](creating_a_new_driver.md), [Creating a New Filter Driver](creating_a_new_filter_driver.md), or [Creating a New Software Driver](creating_a_new_software_driver.md).
trans-unit.target: For information about selecting templates, see [Creating a New Device Function Driver](creating_a_new_driver.md), [Creating a New Filter Driver](creating_a_new_filter_driver.md), or [Creating a New Software Driver](creating_a_new_software_driver.md).

trans-unit.source: WDK and the Visual Studio build environment
trans-unit.target: WDK and the Visual Studio build environment

trans-unit.source: Creating a New Device Function Driver
trans-unit.target: Creating a New Device Function Driver
